kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
Open Excel Document
kw.doc: Opens xlsx document file.
Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Read Excel Cell
kw.doc: Returns content of a cell.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
